Only Cambell and the row labeled "own goals" have an entry in this column.

4. Analyze the comparison results: The rows for Cambell and "own goals" have an entry of 1 in the third column (FA cup). This means that neither of them scored exactly 3 goals in the FA cup, as Whelan did.
